entry.title: [RFC] Lightning invoice/payment format draft
entry.summary: A lightning payment format pull request has been made and the author is seeking wider review. The format is bech32 encoded with optional parts tagged. An implementation of the format can be found at https://github.com/rustyrussell/lightning-payencode. An example payment is provided in the message, including the amount (2500 microbitcoin), the payment hash, and a time limit for the transaction. The full example payment can be found in the message.
